name: ARCaptcha – Puzzle Captcha | New-generation Captcha and bot protection
author: arcaptcha

sections.description:
Detect and Defend against Automated Online Threats

ARCaptcha is a security service that protects your website and online businesses against malicious bot attacks.

ARCaptcha protects your website’s forms, pages, important information, users and customers against account takeover attacks, information theft, spam and other bot-based attacks.

Supporting list:

✔ Login form
✔ Register form
✔ Forgot password form
✔ Comments form
✔ CF7 plugin
✔ Sign-in form in WooCommerce Plugin
✔ Sign-up form in WooCommerce Plugin
✔ Forgot password form in WooCommerce Plugin
✔ Purchase form in WooCommerce Plugin
✔ Track order form in WooCommerce Plugin
✔ WPForm Plugin
✔ ElementorPro Plugin
✔ Digits Plugin
sections.installation:
• Register on the www.ARCaptcha.co/en, after registering, the private keys of your website will be available to you

  • Now install the WordPress plugin and enter the key information on the settings page
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Added Stable version of plugin
  • Added support for Contact form 7

1.2

  • Added support for digits

1.3

  • Added invisible option in default forms
